main event: A ground visual of a white pea-sized body was reported at high speed and disappeared.
interesting points: The object was observed moving at an indicated speed of 360 mph., The sighting occurred at approximately 2000 ft altitude., The object was observed for about 1 minute 30 seconds., The sighting took place on November 23, 1962., The report was a part of the Project Blue Book investigation by the U.S. Navy.
witness description: the witness observed the object visually from the ground
